{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.04563v1", "title": "Counting tame $SL_3$- and some $SL_4$- frieze patterns over finite
  fields", "summary": "In this article we count tame $ SL_3 $-frieze patterns over finite fields and
also tame $ SL_4 $-frieze patterns in the case that their width $ w $ is even.
Let $ n = w + k + 1 $. We consider the sets $ C_k(n) $ of tuples of $ n $
points in the projective space $ \mathbb{P}^{k-1}(K) $, such that $ k $
consecutive points are always independent (the first and last point in the
tuple are considered to be consecutive). We prove that the problem of counting
tame $ SL_k $-frieze patterns can be reduced to counting these sets if $
\gcd(k,n) = 1 $. Otherwise, certain subsets $ C_k^*(n) $ need to be considered
instead. Afterwards we count $ C_k(n)$ in the cases $ k = 3 $ and $ k = 4 $ and
$ C_3^*(n) $, leading to our results.", "main_category": "math.CO", "categories": "math.CO", "published": "2025-05-07T16:54:43Z"}
